get.summary: CommunityPool queries the community pool coins.
DelegationTotalRewards queries the total rewards accrued by a each validator.

parameters.name: delegator_address
parameters.description: delegator_address defines the delegator address to query for.

get.summary: DelegationRewards queries the total rewards accrued by a delegation.

parameters.name: delegator_address
parameters.description: delegator_address defines the delegator address to query for.

parameters.name: validator_address
parameters.description: validator_address defines the validator address to query for.

get.summary: DelegatorValidators queries the validators of a delegator.

parameters.name: delegator_address
parameters.description: delegator_address defines the delegator address to query for.

get.summary: DelegatorWithdrawAddress queries withdraw address of a delegator.

parameters.name: delegator_address
parameters.description: delegator_address defines the delegator address to query for.

get.summary: Params queries params of the distribution module.
ValidatorCommission queries accumulated commission for a validator.

parameters.name: validator_address
parameters.description: validator_address defines the validator address to query for.

get.summary: ValidatorOutstandingRewards queries rewards of a validator address.

parameters.name: validator_address
parameters.description: validator_address defines the validator address to query for.

get.summary: ValidatorSlashes queries slash events of a validator.

parameters.name: validator_address
parameters.description: validator_address defines the validator address to query for.

parameters.name: starting_height
parameters.description: starting_height defines the optional starting height to query the slashes.

parameters.name: ending_height
parameters.description: starting_height defines the optional ending height to query the slashes.

parameters.name: pagination.key
parameters.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

parameters.name: pagination.offset
parameters.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

parameters.name: pagination.limit
parameters.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

parameters.name: pagination.count_total
parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs. count_total
is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key is set.

key.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

offset.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

limit.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

count_total.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs. count_total
is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key is set.

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageRequest.title:
PageRequest is to be embedded in gRPC request messages for efficient
pagination. Ex:

next_key.title:
next_key is the key to be passed to PageRequest.key to
query the next page most efficiently

total.title:
total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total
was set, its value is undefined otherwise

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageResponse.title:
PageResponse is to be embedded in gRPC response messages where the corresponding
request message has used PageRequest

cosmos.base.v1beta1.DecCoin.description:
DecCoin defines a token with a denomination and a decimal amount.

NOTE: The amount field is an Dec which implements the custom method
signatures required by gogoproto.

cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.DelegationDe.description:
DelegationDelegatorReward defines the properties
of a delegator's delegation reward.

cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.Params.description: Params defines the set of distribution parameters.

cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.QueryCommuni.description: QueryCommunityPoolResponse is the response type for the Query/CommunityPool RPC method.

rewards.description: rewards defines the rewards accrued by a delegation.

cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.QueryDelegat.description: QueryDelegationRewardsResponse is the response type for the Query/DelegationRewards RPC method.

rewards.description: rewards defines all the rewards accrued by a delegator.

total.description: total defines the sum of all the rewards.

cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.QueryDelegat.description: QueryDelegationTotalRewardsResponse is the response type for the Query/DelegationTotalRewards RPC method.

validators.description: validators defines the validators a delegator is delegating for.

cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.QueryDelegat.description: QueryDelegatorValidatorsResponse is the response type for the Query/DelegatorValidators RPC method.

withdraw_address.description: withdraw_address defines the delegator address to query for.

cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.QueryDelegat.description: QueryDelegatorWithdrawAddressResponse is the response type for the Query/DelegatorWithdrawAddress RPC method.

params.description: params defines the parameters of the module.

cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.QueryParamsR.description: QueryParamsResponse is the response type for the Query/Params RPC method.

commission.description: commission defines the commision the validator received.

cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.QueryValidat.title: QueryValidatorCommissionResponse is the response type for the Query/ValidatorCommission RPC method

cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.QueryValidat.description: QueryValidatorOutstandingRewardsResponse is the response type for the Query/ValidatorOutstandingRewards RPC method.

slashes.description: slashes defines the slashes the validator received.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.QueryValidat.description: QueryValidatorSlashesResponse is the response type for the Query/ValidatorSlashes RPC method.

cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.ValidatorAcc.title:
accumulated commission for a validator
kept as a running counter, can be withdrawn at any time

cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.ValidatorOut.title:
outstanding (un-withdrawn) rewards for a validator
inexpensive to track, allows simple sanity checks

cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.ValidatorSla.title:
validator slash event
height is implicit within the store key
needed to calculate appropriate amounts of staking token
for delegations which withdraw after a slash has occurred
